title: QUIZ: How Well Do You Know Bigg Boss Season 10?

persons.name: akanksha sharma priyanka jagga muise navin prakash rohan mehra

text: In the first week, the celebrities had to serve the Indiawale. What were the rules? They could only use the jail bathroom They couldnâ€™t sleep on the beds They could not use any kitchen utensils Who was nominated in the first week? Gaurav Chopra, Bani Judge, Manveer Gurjar and Manu Punjabi Monalisa, Gaurav Chopra, Priyanka Jagga Muise and Manu Punjabi Priyanka Jagga Muise, Bani Judge, Monalisa and Manu Punjabi Who was given the first and last rank in terms of popularity in the house? Last was Swami Om and first was Manu Punjabi Last was Swami Om and first was Rahul Dev Last was Rohan Mehra and first was Rahul Dev In one of the riddles given to the celebrities during the task, the question was: Every mother teaches you how to fight with problems but my mother made cigarettes to run the house. I am special child of special mother, guess who? Akanksha Sharma Priyanka Jagga Muise Navin Prakash Rohan Mehra had a song he would sing to annoy the other contestants. Which song was it? Tan tan tan tan tan tara Just chill How much did Nitibha Kaul bid to win the Immunity Medallion? Rs. 24,99,994
